name: Project BBQ
summary:
Project BBQ is the development title for a 3D Action MMORPG in the Dungeon Fighter universe, first revealed at the 2018 Dungeon&Fighter Festival in Korea. 
 
The game's story diverges from the events of Dungeon Fighter Online, changing key events along with the fates of characters and bosses. 
 
No release date has been announced, it is only planed for Korea currently, and no official websites or social pages have been made for the project.
